title: RBI restriction unlikely to dent card companies profits
description: Macquarie Capital stated in a report that the Reserve Bank of India's (RBI) directive to prohibit card networks from facilitating non-bank intermediaries in issuing business cards could reduce card spending volume. However, it won't significantly impact profits in the card business. The RBI cited violations including payments to unregistered entities on card networks.
